author: mhermanto
msg: - Reduce the response size, by filtering the fields needed.
- Prioritize initial iframe size to: requested size, view-specified size, moduleprefs-specified size, default.
- Allow disabling of security token update by setting it to -1.
- gadgets.rpc.call to update_security_token now only work if there is 1+ gadgets receiving it. This avoids warning of rpc service not found.
- Make most (not all yet) JSON keys constants.

author: arkurth
msg: Fixed an 'undefined variable' bug introduced the the previous commit in VMware.pm that was the result of a copy/paste.
Renamed get_image_size() to get_image_size_bytes().  Created new sub called get_image_size().  This was done because image.pm calls get_image_size() and expects the result to be in MB

author: bago
msg: Catch IllegalStateException on public key validation (unsupported algorythm and so on) and throws a permerror with a meaningfull description (DKIM-20)
